content: This is the post, what do you think? Authentic? Will be following up to it as well with automations, results, AI feedback, etc.Two years unemployed. Nothing has worked. I’m turning to AI—and to you—for help.Being unemployed this long has been brutal for me and my family. If you’ve been in this situation, you understand. If you haven’t, I hope you never have to—but with the rapid advances in AI, more white-collar workers will face the same struggle. The Job Market is Changing—FastI followed all the "best practices"—tailored resumes, networking, LinkedIn optimizations, outreach, referrals. Nothing worked.I upskilled, learning data analytics—SQL, Tableau, visualization tools. But AI can already do 80-90% of these jobs. Y Combinator’s investment list for 2025 (in comments) is almost exclusively AI to eliminate white-collar roles. It's happening NOW.AI progress has been mind-blowing. And if the acceleration continues at its current pace, the next two years won’t just be another leap forward—it will be the equivalent of all progress made since the dawn of computing. No one knows what that will look like—AI today is the equivalent of a floppy disk compared to what’s coming in just 2 years. So I Asked AI: What Should I Do?I stopped assuming humans had the answers. I asked AI:Given everything you know about me after working on this for two years—what should I do? Whatever it is, I’ll do it.It told me to: Learn AI automation & implementation to help companies integrate AI. Use AI to optimize my own job search and publicly document the process. Monetize my dog on social media. Yes, really. (I know this sounds crazy—but check out the comments below.) The Experiment: Let AI Guide My Next Career MoveRather than resisting AI, I’m embracing it. AI will dictate how I allocate my time based on feedback from this post, my job search efforts, and business automation case studies. I’ll be sharing: AI-powered job search automation How AI can replace or enhance traditional business processes Experiments with AI-driven content growthPlease Help...Engage with this post. Share, comment and like—it will help me reach the right people. If you know of AI-driven roles where I can help companies adopt, implement, or optimize AI tools, let’s talk. I'm more than willing to start over on salary. My background aligns with:AI Implementation & GTM Strategy (AI Solutions Consultant, AI Adoption Specialist, GTM Strategy Lead)AI-Powered Process Automation (AI Workflow Strategist, AI Automation Consultant, Business AI Specialist)AI-Driven Growth & Revenue Strategy (AI Growth Strategist, Revenue Ops AI Lead, AI-Powered Sales Enablement) If you love dogs, check out Chewy’s channels in the comments and follow the Wide Retriever . Maybe AI will be right and he'll go viral... Follow along here or on X (in comments below) as I document this experiment in AI, career transformation, and content. What questions do you have? For which path do you want to see full automation? Job search Business processes Chewy social
